title.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. "The Chicago Union of Russian Officers, 1621 W. Division St.

div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. "THE CHICAGO UNION OF RUSSIAN OFFICERS, 1621 W. DIVISION ST.

body.p: Dear Sir: The Chicago Union of Russian officers has the honor of inviting you and your friends to be present at the ceremonial conference to honor the memory of the chief commander of the Russian army, Lieutenant General Baron Peter Nikolaevich Wrangel, which is to take place Saturday, June 16, in the YMCA library, 1621 W. Division St.
1. Opening of the conference and report.
The biography of General Wrangel, by Major General A. M. Uzefovich.
2. The Crimean period of White struggle. Dr. L. G. Pertsov-Kaluzhin
4. A word in memory of Dr. V. G. Telesnik by Dr. A. C. Gabriliantz.
5. A word in memory of K. J. Barsov, lieutenant of the fleet, by V. J. Antsiferov.
6. A report of the president of the Chicago Committee for Aid to Invalids in Foreign Lands. Captain V. V. Shumkov.
7-9. Russian songs. Mrs. S. J. Shukhvostova
10-12. Balalaika Quartet. G. Kaminsky, D. Gribanovsky, E. Tupikov,
